InstructionData.Title: AV-SETTER
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# AV-CONFIG - Active Vent Configurer # Configures up to six active vents
# CONFIG define PRESINT 45000 # stress 48636, burst 60795 define PRESEXT 250 define MODE 0 # 0=Outward (Pipe->Ext), 1= Inward (Ext->Pipe) define ON 1 define LOCK 1
alias Vent1 d0 alias Vent2 d1 alias Vent3 d2 alias Vent4 d3 alias Vent5 d4 alias Vent6 d5
alias device r0
init: move device 0 s db Setting -1
loop: bge device 6 end jal configure add device device 1 j loop
configure: bdns dr0 nodevice s dr0 Mode MODE # bug: set Mode first or it resets! s dr0 PressureInternal PRESINT s dr0 PressureExternal PRESEXT s dr0 On ON s dr0 Lock LOCK nodevice: j ra
end: s db Setting 0
